title: Explore options for employers
summary: This page provides information for employers seeking to hire overseas workers when suitable Australian workers are not available. It outlines visa options, sponsorship requirements, steps to nominate workers, and the work rights associated with different visa types. The page also highlights specific categories such as sponsored visas, Temporary Graduate visas, and other visas with work rights.
